1.0.1.en: Updated readme.txt and app.json for homey app requirements

1.1.0.en: added feature request github #1 Adjust brightness and temperature based on reverse LUX over time | Adjust brightness inversely based on LUX over time

1.1.1.en: Added a check to ensure brightness is set to 0 when the device is turned off, overriding the previous brightness value.

1.1.3.en: Added checks for 0 duration and on/off capability, along with optimizations to the code (20% improvement).

1.1.4.en: added Lazy loading in app.js + increase dim interval from 333 ms to 410 ms

1.2.1.en: Performance update - Significant improved dimming speed and reliability through optimized code, better parallel processing, and enhanced device state management. Added improved error handling and smoother transitions.
